summary: A World That Hates Them
title: A World That Hates Them
body:
by Cassplay

Holly Potter has a secret, she’s in love with Ginny Weasley, and Ginny is in love with her. Her sacrifice at the end of the battle of Hogwarts attracts the attention of a pair of Star Sapphire Power Rings.

Words: 2227, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Ms Potter: Power Ring Wielder

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Green Lantern (Comics)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ginny Weasley, Hermione Granger
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Female Harry Potter, lesbian harry potter, Lesbian Ginny Weasley, Internalised Homophobia, Star Sapphire Corps

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FnhW5H

summary: הקסם חזר- ביקורת לסרט "חיות הפלא: הפשעים של גרינדלוולד"
title: הקסם חזר- ביקורת לסרט "חיות הפלא: הפשעים של גרינדלוולד"
body:
הקסם חזר- ביקורת לסרט “חיות הפלא: הפשעים של גרינדלוולד”

סדרת הספרים והסרטים האהובה עלינו של ג’יי קיי רולינג מוציאה סרט שני לסדרת סרטי הספין-אוף שלה- “חיות הפלא”. אז, האם “הפשעים של גרינדלוולד” יצליח במשימה הקשה של לעמוד במוניטין של קודמיו? את זה נבדוק.

קודם כל גילוי נאות, סדרת ספרי הארי פוטר היא סדרת הספרים/סרטים האהובה עלי בהיסטוריה, בלי ספק. לפי עובדות אלה אתם יכולים להבין שלא יכולתי להתרגש יותר כאשר גילית שהסדרה שהביאה לי כל כך הרבה אושר, ממשיכה…

View On WordPress

summary: Bookstore Cutie
title: Bookstore Cutie
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RXB0sC

by Siriusly_mooning_for_moony

Sirius Black works at a tiny little bookstore/coffee shop thingy. Remus starts visiting a whole lot and the lovesick little fool can’t seem to function properly when Remus is in the same room as him. cue the awkward confessions that were never supposed to happen and Sirius having a small heart attack when the cute guy in his store suddenly talks to him.

Words: 1194, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Wolfstar - Fandom
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin
  • Relationships: wolfstar - Relationship, SiriusxRemus
  • Additional Tags: First Meetings, Bookstore AU, wolfstar, Remus is a little bookworm who wears jeans that are wayyy to tight, Sirius might be dying, or having a small heart attack because of the cute guy, not that that is anything new for him, Might be a little swearing, so watch out for the swearwolves ahead


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RXB0sC

summary: Aurelius is Grindelwald’s creation...
body:
Aurelius is Grindelwald’s creation…

now a theory I’ve seen that I like is maybe Credence is carrying Ariana’s obscurus. As they can survive jumping from host to host. Then Grindelwald would look for a specific one but won’t know who the host is. Maybe he searched for it with a spell using Albus’ blood or something. Because he said he kept seeing Credence “with the child” - maybe Ariana? This also explains the phoenix and his surprise to Credence being the obscurial in the first film.

Nevertheless, it doesn’t change the fact that Aurelius Dumbledore is completely fabricated by Grindelwald. To manipulate Credence into hating and probably killing Albus - there is no long lost brother.


I am also %100 sure Aurelius is the name Grindeldore decided upon to give to their child if they ever adopted one but that’s my wishful thinking for you to ignore.

summary: Other Houses of the Weasley Family
body:
Other Houses of the Weasley Family

Arthur as a Ravenclaw with his intense fascination with muggle objects and artifacts. His curiousity is one of his defining features.

Molly as a Slytherin with her intense loyalty to those she loved. She would do anything in her power to protect them.

Bill as a Hufflepuff just going with the flow and sticking with the people he loves.

Charlie as a Ravenclaw with his curiosity and passion for creatures.

Percy as a Slytherin with his ambition and drive to be an influential figure in the ministry. A thirst for greatness.

Fred as a Hufflepuff valuing the people around him more than anything.

George as a Ravenclaw with his passion in creating prank products.

Ron as a Slytherin wanting to stand out and be an individual instead of somebody’s brother or son.

Ginny as a Slytherin with her cunning and doing anything to achieve her goals.

Arthur as a Ravenclaw with his intense fascination with muggle objects and artifacts. His curiousity is one of his defining features.

Molly as a Slytherin with her intense loyalty to those she loved. She would do anything in her power to protect them.

Bill as a Hufflepuff just going with the flow and sticking with the people he loves.

Charlie as a Ravenclaw with his curiosity and passion for creatures.

Percy as a Slytherin with his ambition and drive to be an influential figure in the ministry. A thirst for greatness.

Fred as a Hufflepuff valuing the people around him more than anything.

George as a Ravenclaw with his passion in creating prank products.

Ron as a Slytherin wanting to stand out and be an individual instead of somebody’s brother or son.

Ginny as a Slytherin with her cunning and doing anything to achieve her goals.
trail.content:
Other Houses of the Weasley Family

Arthur as a Ravenclaw with his intense fascination with muggle objects and artifacts. His curiousity is one of his defining features.

Molly as a Slytherin with her intense loyalty to those she loved. She would do anything in her power to protect them.

Bill as a Hufflepuff just going with the flow and sticking with the people he loves.

Charlie as a Ravenclaw with his curiosity and passion for creatures.

Percy as a Slytherin with his ambition and drive to be an influential figure in the ministry. A thirst for greatness.

Fred as a Hufflepuff valuing the people around him more than anything.

George as a Ravenclaw with his passion in creating prank products.

Ron as a Slytherin wanting to stand out and be an individual instead of somebody’s brother or son.

Ginny as a Slytherin with her cunning and doing anything to achieve her goals.

summary:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
body:
For Love and Fear

Someone asked why I wrote my four main OC’s in my Harry Potter fanfic to be related to Harry in a slight unorthodox way. The mother, Judith Athena Potter, is the younger sister of nearly two decades to Harry’s Grandfather, (making her Harry’s gran-aunt and James Potter’s aunt) and her three children Albert, Elisia, and Cecilia were born in the late seventies and early eighties making them Harry’s father first cousins and Harry’s first cousins once removed. Why?

Well I have read the thousands of fanfics that include a long lost sibling, first cousin, uncle, or aunt. Thousands, and at first, Judith was going to be Harry’s aunt (James’ sister) but then I thought it was a little too normal with the thousands of long lost relative fanfics listed above. I wanted my OC’s to be blood relatives to Harry, but not too close to where they could challenge the Dursleys for custody.

Thus the Arendals came to be, close enough to call Harry family but not too close to claim custody over him.

Show Chapter | Archive of Our Own

blog.name: jaebeoma
blog.title: Jaebeoma
blog.description:
|started 19/07/17| GOT7 writings.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN I also write for: BTS , EXO, SOME NCT, MONSTA X , IKON ,PENTAGON , ATEEZ

Currently working on a masterlist but I don’t have many posts

summary: A weasley sweater
body:
A weasley sweater

Request: Hi! I have a jalice request if you don’t mind. So I was thinking Alice and her family have been over for the Wotters Christmas’ before & none of them have received a sweater from Mrs. Weasley. But, this year just Alice (our of her fam) gets one & James is like super proud/happy about it. & like Ginny pulls Mrs. Weasley aside & asks “why did you make Alice one?” (or something) & she basically says like I know I will be making more for their kids or I always knew i’d be making her one. Thank you!!

Pairing : jalice

Genre: FLUFF

Every single year the longbottoms, malfoys , scammanders , finnigans and woods go to the burrows with the wotters , some of them just pop round to give presents and some (like the longbottoms and malfoys ) stay longer. The main Christmas tradition of the wotters was to receive a sweater from Mrs weasley , this was strictly a wotters only tradition and the families that joined in understood after all they had their own family traditions too. Alice was perfectly okay with waiting and watching as James opened his sweater and eagerly pulled it over his head whilst beaming , it practically made her Christmas every year.

This was the secound year that Alice and James has been dating and James was even more excited for Christmas than ever before , he would my shut up about it. Hislist had been written in November, the day after his birthday , and he had made about 300 changes since then. He used mistletoe on Alice as much as possible , just because it was Christmas. Alice didn’t mind but the whole school was getting pretty bothered with James’ festive cheer.

He ran around school wearing a scarf and earmuffs singing Christmas carols at the top of his lungs using the excuse it’s Christmas and he can do whatever he wants , mcgonagall disagreed and he was in a detention every Saturday, but that didn’t stop James.

When school was over all James would talk about was going to the burrow on Christmas.

One night when Alice was around his house, the two of them were just lead together in silence on his bed. “Do you know what James?” Alice said breaking the silence and playing with the strings on James’ hoodie.

“What?” He replied softly whilst smiling at the way Alice was so close to him and playing with his hoodie.

“This is the first time since the lead up to Christmas you’ve not mentioned Christmas” Alice said smiling.

James chuckled ,” it’s because it’s the first time it’s just been the two of us , your so cute all I want to do is look at you”

“Oh really?” Alice said looking into James’ eyes.”is that all you want to do?”

James got a smug smile on his face as he avoided eye contact , “obviously not” he said now playing with the string of alices pyjama bottoms.

James quickly connected their lips , whilst cupping alices face , he felt her melt into the kiss before he went deeper and deeper.

They were practically as intense as you could get before neither of them were fully dressed when they heard a car pull up and the door open downstairs , they quickly disconnected but the two of them were so caught up it took some time to calm down , they were taking heavy breaths and just then they heard footsteps and Harry calling james’ name . James quickly shot of the bed and chucked Alice her top back whilst he put his hoodie back on. Then suddenly the door was swung open. Harry opened the door to see James out of the bed , hair extremely messy, possible sweat on his forehead and breathing heavily. And Alice sat on the bed , her hair was messy too and her top looked like it hadn’t been put on very well. He looked between the two of them ,”James” he said swallowing a lump in his throat.

“Yeah” James replied not making eye contact.

“I need to speak to you downstairs, alone”

James looked at Alice and back down and his fingers ,”why?”

“I think you know why “ Harry replied.

James sighed and followed him out leaving Alice alone in the room.

“So James …. what did I tell you last time I walked in on a situation like this?” Harry said

“Uhhh- situation like what?” James said acting like he was clueless

“You know what James”

James sighed again,” being safe? I’m too young ? She’s too young? I don’t remember it was a while ago”

“Well you’re right that is what I said, so listen to my advice”

“Dad we have been dating for two years , stop babying me , I can do what I want , and if something happens then it’s my fault isn’t it and I have to take responsibility”

And that’s where that conversation ended.

Two days later it was Christmas. Alice arrived at the burrow like usual , the house was beautifully decorated like usual and the smell of Christmas dinner was all throughout the house. Alice found James infront of the tv with his grandad playing a muggle game James played all the time on his xbox. Alice sat in his lap as he played . “Grandad don’t land there land where I’m going , that way we won’t meet people before we get guns and amo” he said

The game got more intense as James kept talking about a storm shrinking and people dying. “Okay there is only two other teams left now , we can do this”

Alice watched the screen and realised that Arthur wasn’t actually that great , James was more protecting him. Soon enough there was only one team left. James was in some sort of shoot out and his fingers were moving frantically against his controller and finally he screamed “ fuck yeah!” To which he got told off for by molly. But he was high fiveing his grandad talking about a victory royal.

“DId you win?” Alice asked practically asleep in james lap with her face snuggled into his chest “Yeah” he said smiling. Molly came in and announced it was sweater time , Alice hopped off of James lap so he could receive his sweater but when molly came around to pass James his sweater , she also passed one to Alice . Alice was so shocked that she only just managed to stammer a thank you very much.

James in the other hand was ecstatic , he was hugging Alice and shaky her like crazy all whilst Alice tried to comprehend the situation.

“I’ll put it on you” James said pulling it over alices head and seeing the smile as her face popped out , giving him the feeling that Alice got every year.

Meanwhile Ginny gestured for molly to speak to her in the kitchen. “What going on mum?” She asked

“What do you mean?” Molly replied

“How come you made everyone a Christmas sweater this year?” Ginny asked

Molly chuckled ,” I always meant to make them sweaters Ginny , I just never really had the time , but this year I started early so everyone can get one , and it made James so happy”

Ginny peered back into the living room to see James still beaming as he made sure everyone realised his sweater was matching with alices.

“Yeah, he is really happy” Ginny replied

“And Alice is apart of the family” molly added

Molly came in and announced it was sweater time , Alice hopped off of James lap so he could receive his sweater but when molly came around to pass James his sweater , she also passed one to Alice . Alice was so shocked that she only just managed to stammer a thank you very much.

James in the other hand was ecstatic , he was hugging Alice and shaky her like crazy all whilst Alice tried to comprehend the situation.

“I’ll put it on you” James said pulling it over alices head and seeing the smile as her face popped out , giving him the feeling that Alice got every year.

Meanwhile Ginny gestured for molly to speak to her in the kitchen. “What going on mum?” She asked

“What do you mean?” Molly replied

“How come you made everyone a Christmas sweater this year?” Ginny asked

Molly chuckled ,” I always meant to make them sweaters Ginny , I just never really had the time , but this year I started early so everyone can get one , and it made James so happy”

Ginny peered back into the living room to see James still beaming as he made sure everyone realised his sweater was matching with alices.

“Yeah, he is really happy” Ginny replied

“And Alice is apart of the family” molly added
